## Introduction

Welcome to **Module 1** of ECON 700.

In this module, you will be introduced to **R** and the **RStudio** environment.

You will also start working with data in R.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this module, you should be able to:

-   Install and navigate R and RStudio.\
-   Understand R’s basic syntax and data types.\
-   Work with variables and simple operations in R.\
-   Import, view, and explore datasets.\
-   Apply descriptive statistics for initial data exploration.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Readings & Resources

-   Irizarry, R. (2025). *Introduction to Data Science: Data Wrangling and Visualization with R*. (Chapters 1-2). Available for free at: <https://rafalab.dfci.harvard.edu/dsbook-part-1/>

-   Wickham, H., & Grolemund, G. (2017). *R for Data Science*. (Chapters 1–3).\

-   Online R documentation: <https://cran.r-project.org/manuals.html>\

-   [RStudio Cheat Sheets](https://posit.co/resources/cheatsheets/)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Activities

-   Complete the hands-on coding exercises embedded in each lesson.\
-   Use WebR to experiment directly in your browser.\
-   Complete the weekly class assignment.\
-   Participate in the discussion form.\
-   Take the weekly knowledge quiz.\
